name: Home
title: Home
body: This is my home page for testing ideas built using Solid JS. This will change a lot as I experiment with ideas I have.
The source code for this site is available on this GitHub repository.

name: About
title: About Me
body: I am a BSc (Hons) graduate who has been confident working with computers in some way for most of my life.
I am currently based in the Gloucestershire area and am looking for local or remote work.

name: Interests
title: My Interests
body: I develop new code ideas as a hobby in my spare time, actively keeping a check on new languages and new computing technologies on the internet.
I keep up to date with music and play musical instruments including the guitar.
